subject: Football
organizations: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
lead_paragraph: Branden Ore shredded Clemson for 203 yards rushing and two touchdowns and Virginia Tech held the No. 10 Tigers to 76 yards in the last three quarters in the Hokies’ 24-7 victory Thursday night.
snippet: Branden Ore shredded Clemson for 203 yards rushing and two touchdowns and Virginia Tech held the No. 10 Tigers to 76 yards in the last three quarters in the Hokies’ 24-7 victory Thursday night.
